WorkItem.Description: This is on Windows 7 with VS 2012 Ultimate with TypeScript 0.8.3 installed. Do I need to uninstall the previous version of TypeScript first?
WorkItem.Summary: 0.8.3.1 installer fails with "VWDExpress11 is not a valid short file name" error

Comments.Message: I also get the same error when uninstalling 0.8.3. Perhaps this is machine specific. Unfortunately, I'm not sure I have any recourse at this point, other than re-imaging. Ugh.
This seems to be related to an issue accessing my disk drive, so nevermind.
